channel.title: InsidiaX Client
channel.description:
I have made a webclient but people can't connect on my No-ip
The webclient loads fine for people. I have made so many post's in the last few days and getting moaned at for it.
If someone actually helped me and told me the way to actually make it work i wouldn't be doing it..
They get the 'Error connecting to server' message when they try login.
I have changed all the IP's in the client from 127.0.0.1 and i can't find a IP to change server Side..
Whats the problem please?

item.title: InsidiaX Client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Server>Src>Server.java/class

ctrl+f Server listening on port, or, 43594 and the ip should be next to it.

Read full topic
